metadata.description: Something strange haunts the neighborhoods of 19th-century London.  Weird creatures are wreaking havoc, and it doesn't look good.  Who will people call?  The police, of course, but also on the case are... the Steambusters!  Celebrated creator Joe Wight delivers the thrilling adventures of a tantalizing and tenacious trio of London lovelies determined to best the worst that the supernatural has to offer!
metadata.name: Steambusters
